trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were no other sightings in New York on or around July 11th 2005
Summary: Small orange/red disk flying west beneath 727 Jet.
divs: sighting detailsmonday july 11, 2005: i was walking home from the train station down glenwood avenue, looking at the sky and clouds as i usually do while walking home. at 7:03 pm, i watched a jet climbing at about 7,000 to 10,000 feet altitude heading out of jfk airport heading due west, make a slow, wide turn to the southeast. at the same time i noticed that there was what at first looked like an orange\red balloon flying eastward at about 5,000 feet in front of and below the jet. as the jet flew over the object, the object made a slow tight circle underneath and towards the jet as if it was watching the jet make the turn southeast. the object waited about ten to fifteen seconds after the jet had made its turn southeast and started moving straight up to about 15,000 feet and then moved through the top of a very large cloud bank and out of sight at 20,000 feet or higher. i saw clearly during the objects slow tight circle (a circle of about a city block) that this object was disk shaped and its shape was much more defined against the white cloud behind it. the object���s movements were completely smooth compared to the very wide left turn the jet had to make to turn southeast. it didn't wobble or move erratically at any time. i can't be sure as to its size but i figure it was about 1\20 the size of the jet it passed underneath. the jet looked like a 727. i have seen many lost balloons floating across the sky before and they all moved according to the direction of the wind. this object first traveled east and then made a slow small circle under the jet as if taking a look at the jet as it made the turn towards the south. i watch the sky whenever i am outside. sooner or later i know will have a sighting.
